data.blankContent: On the same day Hurricane Ivan weakened to a tropical storm in Central Alabama. Even ____ that ____, ____ Northern Alabama, Tropical Storm Ivan weakened ____ a ____. Tropical ____ Ivan ____ as a depression ____ it ____ through ____ states. On September 18 ____ almost ____ its ____ back ____ to ____ Atlantic Ocean. But Tropical Depression Ivan died on September 18 in Eastern Maryland.

Tropical Depre_____ Ivan sta___ as a depression a_ it mo___ through sev____ states. On September 18 i_ almost surv____ its w__ back o__ to t__ Atlantic Ocean. But Tropical Depression Ivan died on September 18 in Eastern Maryland.
data.answer: 同一天，飓风伊万在阿拉巴马州中部减弱为热带风暴。当天晚些时候，在阿拉巴马州北部，热带风暴伊万减弱为低气压。热带低气压伊万在几个州移动时一直是低气压。9月18日，它差点在回到大西洋的路上幸存下来了。但是热带低气压伊万于9月18日在马里兰州东部消失。
